location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that the dispatch sent on 20 May has arrived and the Governor in Council approves the claim made by Mr. Smith at Calcutta against Ahmed bin Seyf.
